paragraphs.text:
%md
# Step 1 - Export Strava data (gpx files) from Strava

Hint: if you choose Settings under your name circle, there will be an option to Download all your data in the bottom of the righthand column of the page.

Or you can navigate to a specific Activity, click on the Wrench(Actions) icon and choose Export GPX

Step 4 - Read the XML into a data frame

Credit to https://github.com/larsbkrogvig/strava-spark/ (Lars Bakke Krogvig)

For later: we might need to scan all the files to get the superset schema as per Lars github.

Container: String = journeyC

Directory: String = strava

df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [_lat: double, _lon: double ... 3 more fields]
Here is the schema detected from the GPX
root
 |-- _lat: double (nullable = true)
 |-- _lon: double (nullable = true)
 |-- ele: double (nullable = true)
 |-- extensions: struct (nullable = true)
 |    |-- gpxtpx:TrackPointExtension: struct (nullable = true)
 |    |    |-- gpxtpx:hr: long (nullable = true)
 |-- time: string (nullable = true)

..
# of rows: 6264
..
done

Goal: flat CSV with athlete, activity type, time, lat, lon, ele, hr

%spark

var df2 = df.withColumn("athlete",lit("dbayard")).withColumn("activityType",lit("Ride")).withColumnRenamed("_lat","lat").withColumnRenamed("_lon","lon")

df2 = df2.select(df2.col("athlete"),df2.col("activityType"),df2.col("time"),df2.col("lat"),df2.col("lon"),df2.col("ele"),df2.col("extensions.gpxtpx:TrackPointExtension.gpxtpx:hr").alias("heart_rate"))


df2.printSchema()

//share this with Python
z.put("myScalaDataFrame", df2)

df2.createOrReplaceTempView("activity_temp")

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Trying pyspark
https://github.com/larsbkrogvig/strava-spark/blob/master/py/preprocessing.ipynb

msg.data:
Trying pyspark

https://github.com/larsbkrogvig/strava-spark/blob/master/py/preprocessing.ipynb

paragraphs.text:
%pyspark
#https://github.com/larsbkrogvig/strava-spark/blob/master/py/preprocessing.ipynb
from pyspark.sql import Window, DataFrame
from pyspark.sql.functions import coalesce, concat, lag, lit, lower, sum, unix_timestamp, max, min, \
                                  sin, cos, atan, sqrt, atan2, toRadians, round, avg, first
#read df from scala
df = DataFrame(z.get("myScalaDataFrame"), sqlContext)

# Timestamp in seconds
df = df.withColumn( 
    'TIME_unix_time', 
    unix_timestamp(df['time'], "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'")
)

# Partitioning on <athlete> and <activity_type>
window = Window.partitionBy('athlete', 'activityType').orderBy('TIME_unix_time')

def calculate_speed(df, window):
    
    R = 6371000 # Earth radius
    
    # Time difference in seconds between tracking point and previous tracking point
    df = df.withColumn(
        'TIME_unix_time_diff',
        df['TIME_unix_time'] - lag('TIME_unix_time', count=1).over(window)
    )

    # Latitude and longditude in radians
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_latR',
        toRadians(df['lat'])
    )
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_lonR',
        toRadians(df['lon'])
    )
    
    # Latitude and longditude in previous tracking point
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_latR_prev',
        lag('DIST_latR', count=1).over(window)
    )
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_lonR_prev',
        lag('DIST_lonR', count=1).over(window)
    )
    
    # Difference in latitude and longditude since previous tracking point
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_latR_diff',
        coalesce(df['DIST_latR'] - df['DIST_latR_prev'], lit(0))
    )
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_lonR_diff',
        coalesce(df['DIST_lonR'] - df['DIST_lonR_prev'], lit(0))
    )

    # Havesine distance calculation between two tracking points
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_a',
        sin(df['DIST_latR_diff']/2) * sin(df['DIST_latR_diff']/2)
        + cos(df['DIST_latR']) * cos(df['DIST_latR_prev'])
        * sin(df['DIST_lonR_diff']/2) * sin(df['DIST_lonR_diff']/2)
    )
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_c',
        2 * atan2(sqrt(df['DIST_a']), sqrt(1 - df['DIST_a']))
    )
    
    # Distance between consecutive points
    df = df.withColumn(
        'DIST_diff_meters',
        coalesce(R * df['DIST_c'], lit(0))
    )
    
    # Momentary speed in km/h
    df = df.withColumn(
        'SPEED_kmh',
        coalesce(
            3.6 * df['DIST_diff_meters'] / df['TIME_unix_time_diff'],
            lit(0)
        )
    )
    
    return df

%pyspark
# Indicator (0,1) of whether time difference is greater than threshold (new activity block)
df = df.withColumn(
    'BLOCK_isnew',
    coalesce(
        (df['TIME_unix_time_diff'] >= pause_threshold_minutes * 60).cast('integer'),
        lit(0)
    )
)

# Sequence number of activity block per athlete and activity 
df = df.withColumn(
    'BLOCK_seqnum', 
    sum('BLOCK_isnew').over(window)
)

# Activity block id "<athlete>_<activity_type>_<integer>"
df = df.withColumn(
    'BLOCK_id',
    concat(
        df['athlete'],
        lit('_'),
        lower(df['activityType']),
        lit('_'),
        df['BLOCK_seqnum'].cast('string')
    )
)

%pyspark
window_block = Window.partitionBy('BLOCK_id').orderBy('TIME_unix_time')

# Recalculate speed within each block
df = calculate_speed(df, window_block)

# Current total distance in km within the block
df = df.withColumn(
    'DIST_BLOCK_km',
    sum('DIST_diff_meters').over(window_block) / 1000
)

# Current time elapsed in seconds within the block
df = df.withColumn(
    'TIME_BLOCK_elapsed_seconds',
    df['TIME_unix_time'] - first(df['TIME_unix_time']).over(window_block)
)

%pyspark
dff = df.select(
    df['athlete'].alias('athlete'), 
    df['activityType'].alias('activityType'),
    df['BLOCK_id'].alias('block_id'),
    df['time'].alias('p_timestamp'),
    df['lat'].alias('p_latitude'), 
    df['lon'].alias('p_longditude'), 
    df['ele'].alias('p_elevation'),
    df['SPEED_kmh'].alias('p_speed_kmh'),
    df['heart_rate'].alias('p_heart_rate'), 
    df['DIST_diff_meters'].alias('p_diff_distance_meters'),
    df['TIME_unix_time_diff'].alias('p_diff_time_seconds'),
    df['DIST_BLOCK_km'].alias('c_cumlative_distance_km'),
    df['TIME_BLOCK_elapsed_seconds'].alias('c_elapsed_seconds')
)

dff.createOrReplaceTempView("temp_results")

%sql
select distinct block_id from temp_results
